questions.question: What is democracy?
options: A system of government by the whole population
A form of government where one person rules
A system where the military controls the government
questions.answer: A system of government by the whole population

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge to democracy?
What does 'majority rule' mean?
options: The majority of people have the right to make decisions
Only the wealthy can make decisions
Decisions are made by a small group of people
questions.answer: The majority of people have the right to make decisions
